verses.verse: Now there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1161>a<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G846>Nicodemus<s%>, a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2424>him<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G2064>art<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1437>doest<s%>, <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G1437>thee<s%>, <S%G3361>Except<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>anew<s%>, he cannot3756, 1410 <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> when he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G3361>old<s%>? can <S%G1410>he<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> a second <S%G1208>time<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G2836>womb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G1437>thee<s%>, <S%G3361>Except<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, he cannot3756, 1410 <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>!

That which is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> that which is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.
Marvel <S%G2296><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G5209>Ye<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>anew<s%>.

The <S%G4151>wind<s%> <S%G4154>bloweth<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G2309>will<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou <S%G191>hearest<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> knowest1492, 1492 <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> it <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4226>whither<s%> it <S%G5217>goeth<s%>: <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> one that is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.
Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> the <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1097>understandest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>?

Verily <S%G281><s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G3754>thee<s%>, We <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> which we <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bear <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G3739>that<s%> which we have <S%G3708>seen<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> earthly <S%G1919>things<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> shall ye <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> heavenly <S%G2032>things<s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> hath <S%G305>ascended<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1487>heaven<s%>, <S%G3361>but<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, even the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>, who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> lifted <S%G5312>up<s%> the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be lifted <S%G5312>up<s%>;
that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> may <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G5620>that<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G622>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> should be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2919>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%>: <S%G1161>he<s%> that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> hath been <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4100>hath<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2920>judgment<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G4238>doeth<s%> <S%G5337>evil<s%> <S%G3404>hateth<s%> the <S%G2532>light<s%>, and <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2443>light<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> should be <S%G1651>reproved<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> may be made <S%G5319>manifest<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G2076>have<s%> been <S%G2038>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> he <S%G1304>tarried<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G137>Enon<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> to <S%G4530>Salim<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3854>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>.

There <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> a <S%G2214>questioning<s%> on the <S%G3326>part<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>'s <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2512>purifying<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, <S%G3739>he<s%> that <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> hast borne <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G1492>behold<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G907>baptizeth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3756>A<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1437>nothing<s%>, <S%G3361>except<s%> it have <S%G5600>been<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G1565>him<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G3565>bride<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>, that <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5463>rejoiceth<s%> <S%G5479>greatly<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G5456>the<s%> <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>'s <S%G5456>voice<s%>: <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> is made <S%G4137>full<s%>.
He <S%G1565><s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G837>increase<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1691>I<s%> must <S%G1642>decrease<s%>.

He that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>: he that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> he <S%G2980>speaketh<s%>: he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> he hath <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>, of <S%G5124>that<s%> he beareth <S%G3140>witness<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%>.
He that hath <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> witness hath set <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4972>seal<s%> to <S%G3754>this<s%>, that <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>he<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%>.
The <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> he that obeyeth <S%G544>not<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G3700>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
